item.title: Exploring Serverless Computing on Microsoft Azure
item.description: Serverless computing is a revolutionary approach to application development that enables developers to build and run applications without having to manage any underlying infrastructure. This article provides an in-depth look at serverless computing on Microsoft Azure, covering the key concepts, benefits, and patterns of serverless applications. What is Serverless Computing?
